scripts.flash: esptool.py --port COM8 --baud 115200 write_flash --flash_freq 80m  -fm dio --flash_size 4MB 0x0000 firmware/boot_v1.6.bin 0x1000 firmware/espruino_esp8266_user1.bin 0x3FC000 firmware/esp_init_data_default.bin 0x3FE000 firmware/blank.bin
scripts.reset: npm run erase && npm run flash
scripts.reupload: npm run reset && npm run upload
scripts.upload: npm run build && espruino -p COM8 -b 115200 --board boards/ESP8266_4MB.json -e "save()" index.js
